metadata.name: Metasploit SMB Authentication
metadata.comment: Alerts on Metasploit host's authentications on the domain.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM authentication WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND ((lower(LOWER(metadata.event_code)) in (4625, 4624)) AND logon_type = 3 AND lower(auth_protocol) = lower('ntlm') AND dst_endpoint.hostname rlike '^\[A-Za-z0-9\]\{16\}$' OR metadata.event_code = 4776 AND dst_endpoint.hostname rlike '^\[A-Za-z0-9\]\{16\}$')

output.summary: Alerts on Metasploit host's authentications on the domain.

metadata.objective: False positive: Linux hostnames composed of 16 characters. Reference: https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/1416b5776d963f21b7b5b45d19f3e961201e0aed/lib/rex/proto/smb/client.rb
